thread.title: Firearm possession should be banned in America | Opinion - Conservative
thread.title_full: Firearm possession should be banned in America | Opinion - Conservative

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Firearm possession should be banned in America | Opinion - Conservative
text:
(Before It's News)
Via David
Just to ruin your day….:) As we watch our recently great culture circle the drain, it is astonishing to reflect that someone must actually want America to die like this. After all, our demise has not been inflicted from the outside.
For some people, our country isn’t going down the tubes quickly enough. An example is Barbara LeSavoy , Director of Women and Gender Studies at the College at Brockport (a.k.a. SUNY Brockport in New York). She recently sounded off on our precious right of self-defense, the constitutional enshrinement of which has helped define our nation:
More @ Moonbattery
